nio/AttributeSelector.description: The AttributeSelector block is used to whitelist or blacklist incoming signal attributes. Whitelisted attributes will be included in or blacklisted attributes will be excluded from the outgoing signal.

attributes.title: Incoming signal attributes
attributes.description: Incoming signal attributes to either include or exclude, depending on whether whitelist or blacklist is chosen as the **selector mode**.

default.description: The incoming list of signals but with attributes modified according to the whitelist/blacklist selections.
